article_node.title: Israeli gunfire kills at least 25 in Gaza as Netanyahu says he will allow Palestinians to leave
article_node.summary: Israeli gunfire has reportedly killed at least 25 people in Gaza as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced plans for a military offensive aimed at taking control of Gaza City and other areas, raising concerns about the humanitarian crisis and the safety of hostages. Netanyahu's strategy includes allowing Palestinians to leave combat zones, which critics warn could lead to ethnic cleansing. Meanwhile, international condemnation is growing over Israel's military actions, with calls for a ceasefire and humanitarian aid access amidst rising starvation and casualties in Gaza.
